about.title: About Me

sections.title: Professional Experience
content: I have worked for 15 years on Corporate Performance Management (CPM) projects, helping organizations optimize their financial and operational performance.
I have experience with technologies such as SAP BPC, SAP BW, SAP Analytics Cloud, and Board, participating in the implementation and optimization of advanced solutions.
I have led highly complex projects in large corporations, managing multidisciplinary teams and ensuring success in demanding environments.

sections.title: Education
content: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering from the Autonomous University of Barcelona (UAB)
Master's in Business Intelligence from the Open University of Catalonia (UOC)
Various training in Angular, React, Node.js, Java Spring Boot, and software architecture

about.summary: I'm passionate about creating digital experiences that not only look great but are also intuitive and accessible to everyone. I believe in technology's power to solve problems and improve people's lives, and I strive to write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code. My approach combines technical excellence with user-centered design to deliver meaningful digital solutions.
